15 class UString {
16 
17  public static function startswith($hay, $needle) {
18  return \substr ( $hay, 0, strlen ( $needle ) ) === $needle;
19  }
20 
21  public static function contains($needle, $haystack) {
22  return strpos ( $haystack, $needle ) !== false;
23  }
24 
25  public static function endswith($hay, $needle) {
26  return \substr ( $hay, - strlen ( $needle ) ) === $needle;
27  }
28 
29  public static function getBooleanStr($value) {
30  return $value ? 'true' : 'false';
31  }
32 
33  public static function isNull($s) {
34  return (! isset ( $s ) || NULL === $s || "" === $s);
35  }
36 
37  public static function isNotNull($s) {
38  return (isset ( $s ) && NULL !== $s && "" !== $s);
39  }
40 
41  public static function isBooleanTrue($s) {
42  return filter_var ( $s, FILTER_VALIDATE_BOOLEAN ) === true;
43  }
44 
45  public static function isBooleanFalse($s) {
46  return filter_var ( $s, FILTER_VALIDATE_BOOLEAN, FILTER_NULL_ON_FAILURE ) === false;
47  }
48 
49  public static function isBoolean($value) {
50  return \is_bool ( $value );
51  }
52 
53  public static function isBooleanStr($value) {
54  return filter_var ( $value, FILTER_VALIDATE_BOOLEAN, FILTER_NULL_ON_FAILURE ) !== NULL;
55  }
56 
70  public static function pluralize($count, $zero, $one, $other) {
71  $result = $other;
72  if ($count === 0) {
73  $result = $zero;
74  } elseif ($count === 1) {
75  $result = $one;
76  }
77  return \str_replace ( '{count}', $count, $result );
78  }
79 
80  public static function firstReplace($haystack, $needle, $replace) {
81  $newstring = $haystack;
82  $pos = strpos ( $haystack, $needle );
83  if ($pos !== false) {
84  $newstring = \substr_replace ( $haystack, $replace, $pos, strlen ( $needle ) );
85  }
86  return $newstring;
87  }
88 
89  public static function replaceFirstOccurrence($pattern, $replacement, $subject) {
90  $pattern = '/' . preg_quote ( $pattern, '/' ) . '/';
91  return preg_replace ( $pattern, $replacement, $subject, 1 );
92  }
93 
94  public static function replaceArray($haystack, $needleArray, $replace) {
95  $result = $haystack;
96  foreach ( $needleArray as $needle ) {
97  $result = self::firstReplace ( $result, $needle, $replace );
98  }
99  return $result;
100  }
101 
102  public static function doubleBackSlashes($value) {
103  if (is_string ( $value ))
104  return str_replace ( "\\", "\\\\", $value );
105  return $value;
106  }
107 
108  public static function cleanAttribute($attr, $replacement = "-") {
109  $attr = preg_replace ( '/[^a-zA-Z0-9\-]/s', $replacement, $attr );
110  while ( $attr !== ($attr = \str_replace ( $replacement . $replacement, $replacement, $attr )) )
111  ;
112  return $attr;
113  }
114 
115  public static function mask($secretString, $maskChar = "*") {
116  return str_repeat ( $maskChar, strlen ( $secretString ) );
117  }
118 
119  public static function isValid($value) {
120  return is_scalar ( $value ) || (\is_object ( $value ) && method_exists ( $value, '__toString' ));
121  }
122 
123  public static function isJson($value) {
124  return is_object(json_decode($value));
125  }
126 
133  public static function toString($value) {
134  if (self::isValid ( $value )) {
135  return $value . '';
136  }
137  return '';
138  }
139 
147  public static function explode($delimiters, $string) {
148  return explode ( $delimiters [0], str_replace ( $delimiters, $delimiters [0], $string ) );
149  }
150 }
